name: truffle-devenv
description: A complete development environment for developing Ethereum Dapps, including client-side and server-side javascript.

scripts.devsetup: yarn install && local_modules link --force --dir src && cd src/app-contracts && yarn install
scripts.test: eslint . && ( cd src/app-contracts && yarn test ) && ( cd src/app-webapp && yarn test ) && ( cd src/app-restserver && yarn test )
